date.name: date
date.description: Date when the event was happen (Use the format "yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss.SSSZ"

maxUsageDuration.name: maxUsageDuration
maxUsageDuration.description: Maximal onblock duration in seconds (for usage-Event)

offline.name: offline
offline.description: Information if the Track was listend offline (for usage-event)

source.name: source
source.description: Key of the playlist, where this event occurs - Special: MyTracks for personal Playlist

trigger.name: trigger
trigger.description: Did the user trigger the play of this item (Play, Skip) (for usage-Event)

type.name: type
type.description: Type of the status event (downloaded, removed, listened)

title: Queen
description:
This is the API for building Mondia-Media-Products, like Tops.

Every call need a valid client or user-token.

  1. Client-Token can be get at our Police-API
  2. User-Token can be get through a login on a customer specific Life-Cycle-Service
  3. UseCases regarding Login, Register, Subscribe (incl. Payment) will be done by the Life-Cycle-Service

methods.description:
This call retrieve a download URL for a Article (Preview/Full).

Please note, that a Full-Binary is only available with a User-Token.
methods.displayName: (Client/User-Token) Get a download URL for a article.

methods.description: This call store a event for a article, that was downloaded, removed or listened.
methods.displayName: (Client/User-Token) Provide a event for a article.

excludeNonStreamable.name: excludeNonStreamable
excludeNonStreamable.description: Exclude Songs that are not streamable

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Number of items to be returned

methods.description: This call search the complete catalogue for this client. Please note, that you need a special client-configuration to use the results of this call for a Preview/Download or a personal playlist.

This call retrieve a streaming URL for a Article (Preview/Full).

Please note, that a Full-Binary is only available with a User-Token.
methods.displayName: (Client/User-Token) Get a streaming URL for a article.

methods.description: This call retrieve the config for a MMPlaylist product.

includeEntities.description: Include Items of the Playlist (Tracks, Collections, AudioBooks)

includeSubEntities.description: Include Items of the Playlist (Chapters, Tracks of a Collection

keepUnavailableItems.name: keepUnavailableItems
keepUnavailableItems.description: Keep Items of the Playlist that are not available. Items will be marked as "notAvailable": true

subscriptionTypeId.description: Return only playlist available for given subscriptiontypeid. include restricted must be false
